Tensioner

Precision cable tensioning system for optimal lifeline performance and safety

Premium Quality
Smart Design

Tensioner assembly combinations include Wire holding unit and Clevis type. Smooth to operate, both end equal adjustment. A tensioner in a horizontal lifeline system is vital for safety, performance, and compliance.

It ensures the cable is correctly tensioned to minimize fall distance, distribute loads safely, and allow long-term system reliability.

Standard: EN 795 : 2012
Material: AISI 304 / 304L / 316
Allowable Working Load: 12 kN
Breaking Strength: 25 kN
Component Code: HHLC-04
Talk to a Safety Expert

Key Features

Certified Safety
EN 795:2012
Smooth Operation
Easy to operate
Equal Adjustment
Both end adjustment
Load Distribution
Safe load handling
